name: TitleInProgress
description:
battle system demo - FULL SCREEN/MOBILE NOT SUPPORTED (yet)

You cannot die, so happy slime hunting! F5 to start over.

WASD/Arrow keys to move

space to attack

  • hold to charge, release to Wild Swing
  • tap twice to combo

escape to enter weapon menu

  • space to select a weapon
  • escape to exit menu
  • different weapons have different damages / charge speed

AI is jacked... (fixing)

Art Credits

  • Environment and land tileset art by Hyptosis
  • Sprites by me

Music/Sound Credits

  • "Crypto" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
